mapper.select:
select file_no, file_name, file_type, file_size, file_fancysize, file_content, file_path, TO_CHAR(file_date,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI') as file_date from t_storage where 1=1
order by file_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_storage( file_no, file_name, file_type, file_size, file_fancysize, file_content, file_path, file_date )values( seq_t_storage.nextval, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize}, #{fileFancysize}, #{fileContent}, #{filePath}, sysdate )

choose.when: and file_type NOT LIKE '%' || 'image' || '%' and file_name NOT LIKE '%' || 'pdf' and substr(file_name, instr(file_name, '.')-1) NOT LIKE '%' || 'doc' || '%' and substr(file_name, instr(file_name, '.')-1) NOT LIKE '%' || 'zip'
